debugMode.label: Debug Mode
debugMode.hint: Enable debug mode to show additional logging information

rollRequestsEnabled.label: Roll Requests Enabled
rollRequestsEnabled.hint: Enable or disable roll requests functionality

groupRollsMsgEnabled.label: Group Rolls in One Chat Message
groupRollsMsgEnabled.hint: When enabled, multiple rolls triggered at once are condensed into a single group message. When disabled, each roll appears as a separate message.

showGroupDCToPlayers.label: Show Group DC to Players
showGroupDCToPlayers.hint: Enable to show the group DC in the group roll message to players.

groupRollNPCHidden.label: Hide NPC rolls in group messages from players
groupRollNPCHidden.hint: When enabled, players will not see roll results from actors they don't have observer permission on in group roll messages. GMs always see all results.

groupRollResultMode.label: Group Roll Result Mode
groupRollResultMode.hint:
Select how to calculate the result of a group roll:
• Standard Rule - At least half the group must succeed.
• Group Average - Simple average of all rolls, rounded down.
• Leader with help - Result from the actor with highest bonus, minus number of group failures.
• Weakest Link - Result from the actor with the lowest relevant skill modifier, plus number of group successes.

useGMTargetTokens.label: Use GM Targeted Tokens
useGMTargetTokens.hint: When players confirm a requested roll, this setting will force use of GM targeted tokens instead of player targeted tokens. If this setting is disabled, the GM targets will only be transferred if the player has no targets.

publicPlayerRolls.label: Default Roll Requests to Public
publicPlayerRolls.hint: When GM sends a roll request to player, the roll mode for that specific request will default to 'public'. It can still be changed on the roll dialog. Disable this to use the GM's current roll mode as default.

skipRollDialog.label: Skip Roll Dialogs (GM)
skipRollDialog.hint: Enable to skip the Roll Configuration windows according to the option selected below. System will use default configurations for the roll when skipped.

skipRollDialogOption.label: Skip Roll Dialog Options
skipRollDialogOption.hint: When Skip Roll Dialogs, which dialogs do you want to skip? This does not affect dialogs on player side.

rollInterceptionEnabled.label: Send Roll Requests from Player Sheets
rollInterceptionEnabled.hint: [Incompatible with Midi-QoL] When enabled, rolls made by the GM for player characters will be automatically redirected to the owner player, if they are online, from character sheets or other modules.

showOfflineNotifications.label: Show Offline Notifications
showOfflineNotifications.hint: Enable to notify the GM before the request when a player is offline. The request will be executed locally.

showRequestNotifications.label: Show Notifications on Request
showRequestNotifications.hint: Enable to notify the GM when a request is successfully sent to the active player

consumptionConfigMode.label: Consumption Config Dialog
consumptionConfigMode.hint: Select if you want to skip the consumption dialog for players, GM or both. This is the dialog where you select concentration, spell slots, etc. When skipped, defaults will be used.

choices.1: Skip dialog for player and GM

placeTemplateForPlayer.label: Place Template for Player
placeTemplateForPlayer.hint: When enabled, only GM will be prompted to place template. When disabled, the player will be prompted to place template, not the GM.

initiateCombatOnRequest.label: Initiate Combat when Requesting Initiative
initiateCombatOnRequest.hint: Enable to automatically initiate the a combat encounter when using the menu to request initiative rolls.

showOnlyPCsWithToken.label: Only Show Actors with Tokens
showOnlyPCsWithToken.hint: The PCs and Groups tabs on the menu will only show actors with tokens in the current scene, unless you explicitly drag an actor from directory into the menu. If disabled, all characters with player ownership will be shown.

favoriteActorsList.label: Favorite Actors List
favoriteActorsList.hint: List of favorite actors that will always appear in the roll menu regardless of token presence.

showMenuOnLoad.label: Show Menu on Load
showMenuOnLoad.hint: When enabled, the roll requests menu will automatically be visible when you reload Foundry.

templateAutoTarget.label: Template Auto Targeting
templateAutoTarget.hint: When a template is drawn on canvas, should tokens be automatically targeted / selected?

removeTemplate.label: Remove Template after Damage
removeTemplate.hint: When enabled, the template will be removed when the damage roll is executed.

templateRemovalTimeout.label: Template Removal Timeout (seconds)
templateRemovalTimeout.hint: How many seconds to wait before automatically removing templates, up to 30 seconds. Only works if 'Remove Template' setting is checked.

supportPatreon.label: Support the developer
supportPatreon.hint: If you like Flash Rolls 5e and my other modules, consider giving your support to the development on Patreon.

compactMode.label: Use Compact Mode
compactMode.hint: Use compact layout for the roll requests menu. The character information will only show on hover.

menuLayout.label: Menu Layout
menuLayout.hint: Choose the layout direction for the roll requests menu.

addMacrosToFolder.label: Place new macros on 'Flash Rolls' Folder
addMacrosToFolder.hint: Check this option to always add new macros inside the 'Flash Rolls' folder. When unchecked, macros will be added to the root of macros directory.

showOptionsListOnHover.label: Show Roll Options on Hover
showOptionsListOnHover.hint: When enabled, the roll options accordion will appear when you hover over the menu with actors selected. When disabled, click the toggle list button to show roll options.

menuIconsLayout.label: Menu Icon Layout
menuIconsLayout.hint: Customize which icons appear in the menu and their order. Drag icons to reorder them and toggle them on/off.

dialogs.noCombatActive: There is no active combat encounter. Would you like to create one before rolling initiative?
dialogs.rerollInitiative: These actors already have initiative: {actors}. Do you want to re-roll?
dialogs.sendRequestNote: Choose whether to send rolls to players or execute locally

hitDie.refillMessage: No hit dice available for {actors}. Would you like to refill their hit dice and send the request?
hitDie.refillMessageLocal: No hit dice available for {actors}. Would you like to refill their hit dice and roll?

midiQOLSettings.title: Adjust MidiQOL Settings?
midiQOLSettings.description: Some of your current settings on MidiQOL won't work well with Flash Rolls 5e. Would you like to adjust them? This preference will be saved so you don't see this message again.
midiQOLSettings.changes:
The following settings from MidiQOL will be disabled if you confirm:
  • Auto Fast Forward Ability Checks
  • Auto Roll Attack (Player)
  • Auto Roll Damage (Player)

menus.noActorsDropHint: No actors in this list. Drag some here from the Actor Directory, or simply add tokens to the active scene.
menus.noGroupsDropHint: No groups in this list. Drag encounter or group actors here from the Actor Directory.
